oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Imperial Hotel Christmas Menu 1914
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Menu for dinner served at the Imperial Hotel (Knoxville,Tenn.) on Christmas Day 1914.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Menus; Hotels; Holidays;
